dmca.title: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 3609
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2005 9:56 AM
To: MSAntiPiracy02
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 36090

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

M> VIA EMAIL:

M> Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

M> URL: http://www.jugle.net/index.php?by=availibility
M>
<http://www.jugle.net/index.php?by=availibility&sort=DESC&availibility=1-2&t
M> ype=Any&searchstring=windows>
M> &sort=DESC&availibility=1-2&type=Any&searchstring=windows
M> CASE #: 36090

M> 21 January 2005

M> Dear Sir or Madam,

M> Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
M> appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed
copies
M> of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to
copyrighted
M> computer programs published by Microsoft.

M> 1. Identification of copyrighted works:

M> Computer program(s):
M> Windows XP Professional
M> Windows 2003 Server Standard
M> Windows 95
M> Windows 98
M> Windows 98 Second Edition
M> Windows Millenium
M> Windows 2000 Professional
M> Windows XP Home Edition


M> Copyright owner:
M> Microsoft Corporation

M> 2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following
M> location(s): http://www.jugle.net/index.php?by=availibility
M>
<http://www.jugle.net/index.php?by=availibility&sort=DESC&availibility=1-2&t
M> ype=Any&searchstring=windows>
M> &sort=DESC&availibility=1-2&type=Any&searchstring=windows

M> The above computer program(s) is being made available for copying,
through
M> downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright
M> owner.

M> 3. Statement of authority:

M> I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
M> notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of
Microsoft,
M> the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a
good
M> faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have
been
M> authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

M> We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you
take
M> expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
M> above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of
this
M> software via your company's network.

M> We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
M> what actions you take.

M> Yours sincerely,

M> James Young
M> Internet Investigator

M> on behalf of Microsoft Corporation
M> One Microsoft Way
M> Redmond, WA 98052
M> United States of America

M> E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB8SYmvK/XpJs6oyURApeoAJ4iWlQ4ZQgVin7xu5J/J/TjG0To3ACfQ+lu
eBMwuCvn8JxMj0hB9T3YXyM=
=2jGh
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
